Based on your preference for storytelling, I'd recommend "Man on Wire" and "Her".

"Man on Wire" is a thrilling documentary that tells the incredible true story of Philippe Petit's high-wire walk between the Twin Towers of the World Trade Center in 1974. It's an inspiring tale of courage, creativity, and determination.

"Her", starring Scarlett Johansson, is a thought-provoking film that delves into modern dating experiences, exploring how our generational attributes shape our relationships. It's a unique blend of narrative and documentary style storytelling.
